title: Pork chilli rojo (Pulled pork with red chilli sauce)
ingredients: ['1 (2kg) boneless pork shoulder roasting joint, trimmed', '3 tablespoons chilli powder', '160g chopped onions', '1L water', '3 (270g) jars salsa', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1/2 (215g) jar mixed chillies, drained and chopped']
